markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 2" pfs="Standard">
[Magic Warrior Transformation](/Spells.aspx?ID=548)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=127" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 95 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You transform into the animal from your mask. You gain the effects of [_animal form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=10), heightened to _magic warrior transformation’s_ level, and you can transform into only the type of animal your mask represents.
name: Magic Warrior Transformation

<summary>
transform into your totem animal.
</summary>
text: Magic Warrior Transformation Two Actions Source World Guide pg. 95 2.0 Cast somatic, verbal Duration 1 minute --- You transform into the animal from your mask. You gain the effects of animal form , heightened to magic warrior transformation’s level, and you can transform into only the type of animal your mask represents.
